name: The sum of divisors of n that are numbers whose number of divisors is a power of 2.
comment: First differs from A033634 at n = 32.
The sum of the terms of A036537 that divide n.
The number of these divisors is A372380(n) and the largest of them is A372379(n).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := Sum[p^(2^k-1), {k, 0, Floor[Log2[e + 1]]}]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100]
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(f = factor(n), p = f[,1], e = f[,2]); prod(i = 1, #p, sum(k = 0, exponent(e[i]+1), p[i]^(2^k-1)));
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 05 2025
